title: Cancer imaging technology can help reveal life-threatening pregnancy disorder

title_detail.value: Cancer imaging technology can help reveal life-threatening pregnancy disorder

summary: An imaging technique used to detect some forms of cancer can also help detect preeclampsia in pregnancy before it becomes a life-threatening condition, a new study says.

summary_detail.value: An imaging technique used to detect some forms of cancer can also help detect preeclampsia in pregnancy before it becomes a life-threatening condition, a new study says.
